sources.title: Brilliant Marriage (1936) ROMANCE
sources.description:
Stars: Joan Marsh, Ray Walker, John Marlowe
Director: Phil Rosen

On the night of her debut, the daughter of Park Avenue socialites meets a strange woman who reveals that she was adopted and her mother was a murderer. Ashamed, she runs away from home, only to fall in love with the wrong guy.

metadata.Plot: The daughter of rich socialites meets a French woman at a party. The woman reveals that the girl is adopted and that her birth mother was a murderer. Ashamed, the girl runs away from home and falls for the wrong man.
metadata.Actors: Joan Marsh, Ray Walker, Hugh Marlowe
